channel.title: Purbanchal Directory - Recently Added Listings - Hotels

item.title: Hotel Rubiz Inn
item.description: Unlike many other hotels and motels,the Rubiz Inn Hotel prides itself on its friendly environment accompanied by professionalism with most sincere behavior which urge traveler come back soon. We are located at the heart of Biratnagar, Traffic Chowk. Our hotel is right at the main market of Biratnagar. You will have the best stay at the cheapest rate. The rooms are clean and cozy. We have authentic restaurant also available for the walk in customers and we provide continental, Chinese, Indian, Newari, American, Italian foods here.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Nana Yala Chhen
item.description: Nana Yala Chhen is the latest addition chain hotels in Patan, Lalitpur by the Nana Hotels. We provide standard and luxurious hotel service with 24 hours free Wi-Fi, high pressure hot and cold water in a safe and friendly environment at budget price.

item.title: Hotel Nana
item.description: Nana Hotels is one of the leading and affordable chain hotels in Kathmandu, Patan, Pokhara and Sauraha. We are one of the most reliable choices for travelers. We provide clean and comfortable accommodation with 24 hours free Wi-Fi, high pressure hot and cold water in a safe and friendly environment.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Hotel Arun Top and Lodge
item.description: Tired of hot weather from Biratnagar, Dharan, Itahari, Jhapa, Birtamod, Duhabi, Rajbiraj, Janakpur, etc. The best option is to pack your bags and come to Bhedetar and enjoy our cool weather and beautiful view of mountains, lakes, forest, hills and beautiful sunrise and sunset. Located at the heart of Bhedetar our hotel provides you with the best foods and lodge to enjoy your short as well as long trips. We provide you with deluxe rooms, single bed as well as double bed facility. Hotel Arun Top and Lodge is the best at Bhedetar. Our services are: 1. Deluxe rooms with attached bathroom 2. Single and double bed with TV 3. Roof top restaurant 4. Conference hall available 5. Fully Family Environment 6. Mountain view from hotel roof top 7. Free WIFI Proprietor Ramesh Shrestha 9842635509
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Hotel Lawati Corner
item.description: Hotel Lawati Corner is a combination of beauty, comfort and taste. Bhedetar a common tourist destination for the eastern part of Nepal is where we are situated. Almost 9 months of the year the weather is hot at the eastern part of Nepal. Bhedetar is such a place where the weather is always cool. If you want to relax from the hot summer look no further and come to our hotel and relax, keep your mind free of hassles from your daily traffic. Hotel Lawati Corner is a Nepalese landmark holiday destination. We have delighted guests with traditional Nepali hospitality set within cool environment of Bhedetar. Beautifully situated at Rjarani Road of Bhedetar. Hotel Lawati Corner is an ideal location for romantic excursions, peaceful family vacations, and holiday escapes from the hectic pace of everyday life. Hotel Lawati Corner combination of beauty, comfort and taste. That is in the class from of an exotic place to relax and enjoy delicious cuisine amidst the magnificent views of the most beautiful Himalaya Mt.Makalu of Mahalangur range reflecting itself within the Bhedetar.It names describe its location that is slight far from Bhedetar , and located as Corner of Bhedetar bazzar. Mr. Lila Raj Lawati Designation : Managing Director Phone : 977-9852049339
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Hotel Kanjirowa Hile
item.description: Our hotel is located in Hile Bazaar which the northern side of Dhankuta bazaar. The Bazaar is located in Dhankuta Municipality; ward No-1. We have luxurious detached country houses complete with large gardens, built using sustainable materials as much as possible, minimising its effect on the environment and working with the local population. Hile Bazaar is located in the northern side of Dhankuta bazaar. The Bazaar is located in Dhankuta Municipality : ward No-1.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Hotel Suravi
item.description: Thinking about holiday? Dhankuta is the headquarter of Koshi Zone, Nepal. Hotel Suravi is situated at the heard of the city. One of the oldest hospitality business of the town is one of the best Hotels at Dhankuta, Nepal. Known for its friendly staffs and good foods you will mesmerize and cherish the stay at our hotel. Our well furnished rooms as well as clean bed sheet will certainly add value to your stay. The natural hills and scenic beauty will make you forget about the chaos of the city and traffic jams. Dhankuta is known for the greenery as well as temples and ethnic foods. The food lovers will definitely enjoy our varieties offered.
item.dc:creator: superadmin
